tab.name: Mailing lists
tab.description: Listing of all the mailing lists for Acajoom

param.name: @spacer
param.default: Parameters to configure the Acajoom CB Plugin.
param.label: About:

param.name: show_archive
param.label: Show Archive Links
param.description: Select yes to show a link to the lists archive if the list allows it.

param.name: public_view
param.label: Allow Public View
param.description: Select yes to allow users to see this tab when viewing other users profiles.

param.name: acajoom_itemid
param.label: Acajoom Link ItemId
param.description: If left blank will default to the ItemId for community builder menu link. This causes links to the list archives to lead to archive pages with the same modules shown when viewing a profile and without the modules that would appear if you followed an acajoom menu link. To correct this enter in the ItemId for the menu link to component - acajoom.
